info.title: Redocly Museum API
info.description: Imaginary, but delightful Museum API for interacting with museum services and information. Built with love by Redocly.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Starting date to retrieve future operating hours from. Defaults to today's date.

schema.description: List of museum operating hours for a date range.

items.description: Daily operating hours for the museum.

date.description: Date the operating hours apply to.

timeOpen.description: Time the museum opens on a specific date. Uses 24 hour time format (`HH:mm`).

timeClose.description: Time the museum closes on a specific date. Uses 24 hour time format (`HH:mm`).

post.description: Creates a new special event for the museum.

location.description: Location where the special event is held.

eventDescription.example: Captain Blackbeard shares his love of the C...language. And possibly Arrrrr (R lang).

dates.description: List of planned dates for the special event.

price.description: Price of a ticket for the special event.

value.eventDescription: Join us as we review and classify a rare collection of 20 thingamabobs, gadgets, gizmos, whoosits, and whatsits, kindly donated by Ariel.

get.description: Return a list of upcoming special events at the museum.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Starting date to retrieve future operating hours from. Defaults to today's date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End of a date range to retrieve special events for. Defaults to 7 days after `startDate`.

location.description: Location where the special event is held.

eventDescription.example: Captain Blackbeard shares his love of the C...language. And possibly Arrrrr (R lang).

dates.description: List of planned dates for the special event.

price.description: Price of a ticket for the special event.

value.name: Sasquatch Ballet
value.eventDescription: They're big, they're hairy, but they're also graceful. Come learn how the biggest feet can have the lightest touch.

value.name: Solar Telescope Demonstration
value.eventDescription: Look at the sun without going blind!

value.name: Cook like a Caveman
value.eventDescription: Learn to cook on an open flame.

value.name: Underwater Basket Weaving
value.eventDescription: Learn to weave baskets underwater.

value.name: Mermaid Treasure Identification and Analysis
value.eventDescription: Join us as we review and classify a rare collection of 20 thingamabobs, gadgets, gizmos, whoosits, and whatsits â€” kindly donated by Ariel.

value.name: Time Traveler Tea Party
value.eventDescription: Sip tea with important historical figures.

value.name: Pirate Coding Workshop
value.eventDescription: Captain Blackbeard shares his love of the C...language. And possibly Arrrrr (R lang).

value.name: Llama Street Art Through the Ages
value.eventDescription: Llama street art?! Alpaca my bags -- let's go!

value.name: The Great Parrot Debate
value.eventDescription: See leading parrot minds discuss important geopolitical issues.

value.name: Eat a Bunch of Corn
value.eventDescription: We accidentally bought too much corn. Please come eat it.

get.description: Get details about a special event.

location.description: Location where the special event is held.

eventDescription.example: Captain Blackbeard shares his love of the C...language. And possibly Arrrrr (R lang).

dates.description: List of planned dates for the special event.

price.description: Price of a ticket for the special event.

patch.description: Update the details of a special event.

value.name: Mermaid Treasure Identification and Analysis
value.eventDescription: Join us as we review and classify a rare collection of 20 thingamabobs, gadgets, gizmos, whoosits, and whatsits, kindly donated by Ariel.

delete.description: Delete a special event from the collection. Allows museum to cancel planned events.

post.description: Purchase museum tickets for general entry or special events.

allOf.description: Ticket for museum entry, can be general admission or special event.

ticketId.description: Unique identifier for museum ticket. Generated when purchased.

ticketDate.description: Date when this ticket can be used for museum entry.

ticketType.description: Type of ticket being purchased. Use `general` for regular museum entry and `event` for tickets to special events.

eventId.description: Unique identifier for a special event. Required if purchasing tickets for the museum's special events.

schema.description: Details for a museum ticket after a successful purchase.

allOf.description: Ticket for museum entry, can be general admission or special event.

ticketId.description: Unique identifier for museum ticket. Generated when purchased.

ticketDate.description: Date when this ticket can be used for museum entry.

ticketType.description: Type of ticket being purchased. Use `general` for regular museum entry and `event` for tickets to special events.

eventId.description: Unique identifier for a special event. Required if purchasing tickets for the museum's special events.

message.description: Confirmation message after a ticket purchase.

confirmationCode.description: Unique confirmation code used to verify ticket purchase.

get.description: Return an image of your ticket with scannable QR code. Used for event entry.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Identifier for a ticket to a museum event. Used to generate ticket image.

200.description: Scannable event ticket in image format.

schema.description: Image of a ticket with a QR code used for museum or event entry.

StartDate.name: startDate
